plugin.name: Spotify
plugin.title: 3rd Party Spotify Plugin
plugin.desc: Listen to your Spotify on your Squeezebox. This plugin requires a subscription to a Spotify Premium and a local Squeezebox server. It supports Spotify playback on Squeezebox2, Squeezebox3, Classic, Transporter, Boom, Duet, Touch and Radio players and will support sychronised playback between players.
plugin.creator: Triode
